text: Uncanny Tales may refer to one of the following publications: * Uncanny Tales (US pulp magazine), an American pulp magazine * Uncanny Tales (Canadian pulp magazine), a Canadian pulp magazine * Uncanny Tales (comic), a horror comic published by Atlas Comics in the 1950s * Uncanny Tales (Sheckley), a 2003 collection of short stories by Robert Sheckley
title: Uncanny Tales
